title: Balancing AI and Human Expertise in Medical Education: Instructional Design Strategies through Qualitative Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Field Knowledge, Foundational Understanding of Teaching Methods, Experience with AI Tools
context.additional_context: Simulation environment exploring ethical impacts of AI dependency and strategies for maintaining instructional autonomy for medical professionals

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the scope of AI applications in medical education according to ethical frameworks.
Learners can design collaboration strategies between AI tools and human expertise in VR simulation environments.
Learners can propose instructional design solutions to reduce AI dependency through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
